title: Military AI contracts awarded to Anthropic, OpenAI, Google, and xAI
description:
The Pentagon has opened the military AI floodgates and handed out contracts worth up to $800 million to four of the biggest names: Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, and Elon Musk’s xAI. Each company gets a shot at $200 million worth of work. Dr Doug Matty, Chief Digital and AI Officer, said: â€œThe adoption of AI is […]
